text: KHCV (104.3 FM, "CV 104.3") is a class A radio station broadcasting an oldies format from Mecca, California. ==History== On September 5, 2014 the station began broadcasting as KFUT before changing its call sign to the current KHCV on February 4, 2016. On September 21, 2020 CV 104.3 flipped from adult contemporary to an oldies format with no other changes. ==References== ==External links== Category:Mass media in Riverside County, California Category:Radio stations established in 2015 HCV (FM) Category:2015 establishments in California
title: KHCV (FM)
